objectTitle: Data: Cities and Regions in Britain through hierarchical percolation
objectDescription: The research in this paper can be reproduced with the two provided datasets from Crown Copyright and Database Right[February 2016].Ordnance Survey(Digimap Licence) 1) UK_coordinates_mod.txt This file contains a list of the all the intersection points, with columns for id of point, its coordinate x and its coordinate y . 2) UK_ncol_mod.txt This file contains the information about the whole network. It is in the form of id of node 1, id of node 2 and the weight is given by the real length of the road connecting these two points.

Rights.rightsStatement: Crown Copyright and Database Right [February 2016]. Ordnance Survey (Digimap Licence)
Rights.rightsHolder: Controller of Her Majesty's Stationery Office

access.accessStatement: The Digimap EULA states that in order to access and use the data you must be an 'Authorised User'. To be an Authorised User you must satisfy all of the following conditions: be permitted to access an Authorised Institution's electronic information services; and be registered with the Digimap service
